alert.note: Alert for Otero Mesa (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 4:28AM MDT until October 30 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 25 to 30 degrees. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Otero Mesa. In Texas, Northern Hudspeth Highlands/Hueco Mountains and Southern Hudspeth Highlands. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some sheltered sites in these zones may have dropped below freezing this morning, but a longer and more thorough freeze is likely tonight.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
